message: Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mSurfaceWidth' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.

Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mSurfaceCenterY' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mSurfaceScale' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mSurfaceTranslationX' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.

Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mInitialTranslationY' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
